00038 #include <graphiceq.h>
00039 
00040 static REAL EQ_Num[3];
00041 static REAL EQ_Den[3];
00042 
00043 static REAL EQ_Num_48000[] = { 0.99220706371, -1.98392450292, 0.99220706371 };
00044 static REAL EQ_Den_48000[] = { 1.98392450292, -0.98441412742 };
00045 static REAL EQ_Num_96000[] = { 0.99608835009, -1.99205381333, 0.99608835009 };
00046 static REAL EQ_Den_96000[] = { 1.99205381333, -0.99217670018 };
00047 static REAL EQ_Num_192000[] =
00048     { 0.99804034984, -1.99604991764, 0.99804034984 };
00049 static REAL EQ_Den_192000[] = { 1.99604991764, -0.99608069967 };
00050 
00051 EQ new_EQ( CXB d, REAL samplerate, int pbits )
00052 {
00053     ComplexFIR BP;
00054     EQ a = ( EQ ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( eq ), "new eq state" );
00055 
00056     BP = newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -6000.0, 6000.0, samplerate, 257 );
00057     a->p = newFiltOvSv( BP->coef, 257, pbits );
00058     a->in = newCXB( 256, FiltOvSv_fetchpoint( a->p ), "EQ input CXB" );
00059     a->out = newCXB( 256, FiltOvSv_storepoint( a->p ), "EQ output CXB" );
00060     a->data = d;
00061     delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( BP );
00062     memset( a->num, 0, 9 * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00063     memset( a->den, 0, 6 * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00064     a->notchflag = FALSE;
00065     if ( samplerate == 48000.0 )
00066     {
00067         EQ_Num[0] = EQ_Num_48000[0];
00068         EQ_Num[1] = EQ_Num_48000[1];
00069         EQ_Num[2] = EQ_Num_48000[2];
00070         EQ_Den[0] = EQ_Den_48000[0];
00071         EQ_Den[1] = EQ_Den_48000[1];
00072     }
00073     if ( samplerate == 96000.0 )
00074     {
00075         EQ_Num[0] = EQ_Num_96000[0];
00076         EQ_Num[1] = EQ_Num_96000[1];
00077         EQ_Num[2] = EQ_Num_96000[2];
00078         EQ_Den[0] = EQ_Den_96000[0];
00079         EQ_Den[1] = EQ_Den_96000[1];
00080     }
00081     if ( samplerate == 192000.0 )
00082     {
00083         EQ_Num[0] = EQ_Num_192000[0];
00084         EQ_Num[1] = EQ_Num_192000[1];
00085         EQ_Num[2] = EQ_Num_192000[2];
00086         EQ_Den[0] = EQ_Den_192000[0];
00087         EQ_Den[1] = EQ_Den_192000[1];
00088     }
00089     return a;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void delEQ( EQ a )
00093 {
00094     if ( a )
00095     {
00096         delCXB( a->in );
00097         delCXB( a->out );
00098         delFiltOvSv( a->p );
00099         safefree( ( char * ) a );
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 void graphiceq( EQ a )
00104 {
00105     int sigsize = CXBhave( a->data ),
00106         sigidx = 0;
00107 
00108     do
00109     {
00110         memcpy( CXBbase( a->in ), &CXBdata( a->data, sigidx ),
00111                 256 * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00112         filter_OvSv( a->p );
00113         memcpy( &CXBdata( a->data, sigidx ), CXBbase( a->out ),
00114                 256 * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00115         sigidx += 256;
00116     }
00117     while ( sigidx < sigsize );
00118     if ( a->notchflag )
00119     {
00120         int i;
00121 
00122         for ( i = 0; i < sigsize; i++ )
00123         {
00124             int j;
00125 
00126             for ( j = 0; j < 3; j++ )
00127             {
00128                 COMPLEX numfilt;
00129                 int k = 3 * j,
00130                     l = 2 * j;
00131 
00132                 a->num[k] = CXBdata( a->data, i );
00133                 numfilt.re =
00134                     a->num[k].re * EQ_Num[0] + a->num[k + 1].re * EQ_Num[1] +
00135                     a->num[k + 2].re * EQ_Num[2];
00136                 numfilt.im =
00137                     a->num[k].im * EQ_Num[0] + a->num[k + 1].im * EQ_Num[1] +
00138                     a->num[k + 2].im * EQ_Num[2];
00139                 a->num[k + 2] = a->num[k + 1];
00140                 a->num[k + 1] = a->num[k];
00141                 CXBdata( a->data, i ) =
00142                     Cmplx( numfilt.re + a->den[l].re * EQ_Den[0] +
00143                            a->den[l + 1].re * EQ_Den[1],
00144                            numfilt.im + a->den[l].im * EQ_Den[0] + a->den[l +
00145                                                                           1].
00146                            im * EQ_Den[1] );
00147                 a->den[l + 1] = a->den[l];
00148                 a->den[l] = CXBdata( a->data, i );
00149             }
00150         }
00151     }
00152 }
